title: Firefox window won't show up.
content: Hello, my mac ran out of battery. When I restared it, the firefox page restarted, but I can't see it. When I click on it in the app scrolling menu, nothing turns up. It's like it is there, but as a ghost, invisible. When I close down firefox, and restart, it's still exactly the same. I had hundreds of tabs open there, and I don't want to loose that session. When I open a new window, it works, but I can't make the prevous one appear. What is going on, what to do? I'm quite desperate about it, already spent hours looking for solutions.
creator: cicerobuck

title: no me deja entrar en la pagina www.sede.fnmt.gob.es. / Código de error: SEC_ERROR_UNKNOWN_ISSUER
content:
No me daja entrar en esta pagina, me marca: Código de error: SEC_ERROR_UNKNOWN_ISSUER www.sede.fnmt.gob.es. https://www.sede.fnmt.gob.es/certificados/persona-fisica/obtener-certificado-con-dnie


Por favor necesito entrar en esta pagina urgentemente, para gestionar el certificado y realizar gestiones importantes
creator: josecarbonell9

title: Add links to start page
content: How do I add a link to the start page that shows when you open a new tab? I've read support docs and I don't have a "pin icon" on my toolbar... I'm on MacOS (M1) and latest (Feb '24) FireFox...... how can it be so non-intuitive? I can't find an option anywhere...
creator: chris.douglass
